name: Pocket God Jump
description:
You’re a little Ooga who’s trying to get to heaven, but what you don’t know is that the path never ends and you just have to go up and up.

You have two choices: either you keep going up or you fall and die. It’s up to you. 

But if you start climbing and fall, you’ll see everything you’ve climbed to the ground.

Good luck on your infinite path to heaven, get as far as you can.
